translation.Deseja permitir o uso da câmera?: Do you want to allow camera usage?
translation.Tem certeza de que deseja denunciar este: Are you sure you want to report this fire?
Your report has been successfully canceled.
translation.OBS:a denuncia será feita na sua localiz: NOTE: The report will be made at your current location.
translation.Mantenha sua propriedade livre de vegeta: Keep your property free from dry vegetation and flammable materials. Create a safety zone around your home by removing nearby bushes and trees.
translation.Nunca jogue cigarros acesos no chão ou p: Never throw lit cigarettes on the ground or out of the car window. Use fireproof portable ashtrays to safely dispose of cigarettes.
translation.Siga as regulamentações locais ao fazer: Follow local regulations when making campfires or barbecues outdoors. Always have a fire extinguisher or water nearby.
translation.Anomalias térmicas são áreas de temperat: Thermal anomalies are areas of abnormally high temperature detected by satellites. They can be indicative of developing forest fires.
translation.Use nosso mapa interativo para identific: Use our interactive map to identify thermal anomalies near your location. Be alert to sudden temperature changes in your area.
translation.Elabore um plano de evacuação com sua fa: Create an evacuation plan with your family, including meeting points and emergency contacts. Keep an evacuation backpack with essential supplies ready.
translation.Mantenha-se informado sobre alertas de i: Stay informed about fire alerts and local weather conditions. Use emergency alert apps to receive real-time information.
translation.Mantenha um kit de primeiros socorros co: Keep a complete first aid kit at your home and in your vehicle. Include essential items such as bandages, medications, and drinking water.
translation.Como posso obter informações em tempo re: How can I get real-time information about fires?
translation.Você pode usar nosso aplicativo para ace: You can use our app to access updated information about fires and thermal anomalies in your region.
translation.O que devo fazer se me deparar com um in: What should I do if I encounter a forest fire?
Stay safe and move away from the fire. Call the local emergency number immediately and follow the authorities' instructions.
